snippet: A government lawsuit against a background check company is a good start and puts the industry on notice. But a growing trade needs even closer scrutiny.
abstract: Editorial calls for federal and state governments to do more to protect people from faulty criminal background checks, which is playing a bigger and bigger role for employers in hiring decisions; commends the Federal Trade Commission for taking long overdue action and charging HireRight Solutions Inc with violating the Fair Credit Reporting Act.
lead_paragraph: A government lawsuit against a background check company is a good start and puts the industry on notice. But a growing trade needs even closer scrutiny.
